A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I gave it only two stars and that was more then generous. People used to argue about prequels\, but comparing to them\, this "trilogy" is utter pile of attempts how to destroy one of the most successful movie franchise ever. 

Illogical story\, meaningless sub-plots and pointless and useless characters on rise\, while killing the ones everybody cared about\, following the story from the Force Awakens and / or from original trilogy.  

Star Wars series become a ship without captain where each captain disprove course and actions of the previous one leading the ship to a new unknown. This is not creative attempt\, it is example of bad and perplexed writing and even more horrible execution of the highly successful commercial project.
